1: <pb/><t>A Yespíritu Jehová Cajlil, a 'ix ya'ch 'ayin, yujto sic'b'iln 'el yu'uj. Checb'iln cot yu'uj, yic tzwul walnc 'el wach' 'ab'x 'a eb' meb'a', tzlaj wa'nc can b'oxc sc'ojl eb' ya yaji, tzwaln 'el yab'xil colnb'il 'a eb' 'icha preso yaji.</t>
2: <t>Tzwaln 'eli, to tox xjaw sc'ul yajx colnb'il tzyac' Jehová, xjaw sc'ul ya'n Dios spac 'a eb' 'ajc'ojol. Checb'iln cot yu'uj, yic tzwul wa'nc sniwnal sc'ojl eb' 'ay scusc'ojlal.</t>
3: <t>In jaw wul wac' scorona eb' 'aj Sión 'aych 'a scusc'ojlal, atn sniwnal sc'ojl eb' tz'ajx sjelc stan̈il c'ac' tzlaj yac' q'ue eb' 'a sjolom. Tzwa'n stzaljc'ojlal eb' sjelc yal sat, ax eb' 'ay somc'ojlal, a b'it yic alj wach' paxti', a tzwa'cn 'a eb'. Ax yalx yuj eb' to lajn eb' 'icha junc 'awb'ente 'awb'il yuj Jehová. 'Oj sb'o eb' tojlal, sec 'oj b'inaxc sb'i yuj eb'.</t>
4: <pb/><t>'Oj scha b'oc pax chan̈ eb' jun tzo'n̈ schon̈b' satnc can 'ejmi, ax sb'on eb' sjel jun tzo'n̈ n̈a lan̈chjnac can 'ejm 'a yic pecti cha.</t>
5: <t>A eb' chuc chon̈b'al, a eb' 'oj 'och yilmalc e calnelu, 'oj 'och eb' e mosooc, ax stan̈wni eb' eyawb'en uva.</t>
6: <t>Ax yaln eb' 'anma eyu'uj, to ya'mal 'och sti eb' 'anma chi eyaj 'a Jehová, schecb' ex Dios. A tas 'ay 'a jun tzo'n̈ xo nacion̈, a chi 'oj tzaljoc e c'ojl e c'uxni, ax tas wach' yilx 'ay 'a eb', a chi 'oj e c'anlb'oc, sec 'oj e b'inaxi.</t>
7: <t>Ax tic 'ec'b'al xo xeyutj eyab'n syail, 'ec'b'al ex 'aj e b'uchxi, ex laj b'ajxi, yuj cha, ax ticnec, 'ec'b'al xo sricoal 'oj eyaj 'a yol e chon̈ab', man̈x 'a b'a'n̈ 'ay slajb' e tzaljc'ojlal.</t>
8: <pb/><t>A Jehová a tzaln 'ixtic: A tojlal a chi tzin nib'ej, chacb'il 'el eb' 'elc'm wu'uj yet' eb' milm cham 'anma'. Caw yel 'oj wac' 'el'choc tas tzwala, to 'oj wac' spac eyico', ax in b'on pax in trato eyet' 'a jun 'ejmn̈ej.</t>
9: <t>Caw wal 'oj b'inaxc eb' eyin̈tl 'a scal jun tzo'n̈ xo nacion̈ b'aq'uin̈, ax smasnil 'anma 'oj 'ilnoc 'och eb', 'oj nachjoc 'el yuj eb' chajtlto an Jehová in, an tzwac' in wach'c'ojlal 'a eyib'an̈, xchi Dios.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Caw wal tzin tzalj ticnec yuj Jehová. Caw wal tzjaw in tzaljc'ojlal yuj in Diosal, yujto caw wach' xyutj ya'n in colnb'il, a tojlal, a chi 'icha to x'och in pichloc yu'uj. 'Icha tz'aj junc quelem mto junc cob's 'ix tz'och 'a nupnel, 'ixta in yutj in sb'oni.</t>
11: <t>Yujto 'icha wal tz'aj spac' q'uet junc 'in̈t 'a yol lu'um, mto 'icha tz'aj sq'uel swol junc 'awb'ente', 'ixta 'oj yutc Jehová ya'n checljoc chan̈ stojlal, sec tzalx wach' paxti yuj eb' nacion̈ 'a 'a.</t>
